products.title: Gainsborough Mulberry Roman Blind
products.description: A classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home. This gainsborough mulberry roman blind takes traditional tartan and infuses it with rich berry shades alongside neutral and natural tones to great effect. The end result is a beautiful, cosy window dress a classic pattern in a modern palette is the perfect way to dress your home.

products.title: Amelie, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: The amelie mulberry completely encompasses true country style. Sat on a bed of grainy oatmeal are blossoming florals in a faded forest green and pretty lilacs and heathers. The rustic aesthetic is neatened somewhat by the structured arches of the roman, creating a sumptuous yet rural theme that will suit any country home. Bring your country kitchen to life by joining the mulberry with the natural weaves of wicker and hessian and accompanying with rustic, unfinished woods.

products.title: Polka Dot Purple Roman Blind
products.description: Emma bridgewaters popular polka dot pattern is full of cheerfulness. The little pops and dots of colour on this polka dot purple roman blind, with shades of purple, red, green and yellow on cream, will always signify 'instant fun. Get spotty and go dotty in your kitchen and uti emma bridgewaters popular polka dot pattern is full of cheerfulness.

products.title: Sumi Indigo Roller Blind
products.description: Harlequin certainly don't design patterns that shrink into the background. In fact, they thrive off the bold and show-stopping. And this certainly shows with the sumi indigo roller blind. An abstract, geometric design is paired with a bold blue shade, the soft neutral backgroun harlequin certainly don't design patterns that shrink into the background.

products.description: The brightness of a white blind with the slick modern vibe of a grey, this blind is perfect for making a space feel bright, airy and uplifted. products.title: Bali Indigo Roman Blind
products.description: Harlequin are world renowned for their expertise in making stripes stylish, sophisticated and elegant. This bali indigo roman blind is certainly no exception, in fact it only enhances their reputation. The variation in stripes creates an interesting look but without the harmon harlequin are world renowned for their expertise in making stripes stylish, sophisticated and elegant.

products.title: Origin, Plum - Vista Blind
products.description: Giving your home the finishing touches it deserves is all about adding style and substance in equal measure. Origin plum combines rich wholesome coloured fabric with an elegant voile that allows you to control the light levels in your room with ease. By bringing everything together in a series of clean modern cuts and lines the origin range allows you to give your home a truly modern touch of style.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash sloe purple is a soft chic purple perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this on-trend purple blind is especially great for adding a soft splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash orchid purple is a lush purple/pink perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous purple blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Kaleidoscope, Plum High Gloss - Venetian Blind
products.description: Plum is the perfect deep relaxing colour for those looking to get away from it all once they get home. The soothing character of plum works in harmony with the high gloss finish to provide a crisp and clean aesthetic which allows you to make a feature of window spaces like never before. Add in blacks and whites to celebrate the extremes of the colour spectrum as your touch of plum sits handsomely in the middle taking pride of place as the focal point of your room.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash sloe purple panel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This purple dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Panel Blind
products.description: Their moisture-resistant splash orchid purple panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The bold purple panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its warm, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Dark Purple - Loft Blind
products.description: Our plain blackout fabrics collection feature their most popular blackout colours. This tight woven plain fabric has a self coloured pvc backing which prevents any light filtering through - perfect for blocking out the light on those early summer mornings or helping night workers to get to sleep. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Kent, Mulberry - Roman Blind
products.description: If one colour spells luxury, it has to be purple. So combined with the plush fabric of the kent collection, the deep berry shade of the mulberry creates a warmth and cosiness that just cannot be matched. Create a homely yet romantic feel in the living room, blending the mulberry with cream walls, dark wooden floorboards, and brushed gold finishings. Keep sofas and chairs in either purple or cream, with cushions in opposing colours, incorporating a pretty pattern if you can.
